widget.description: Generates detailed database statistics regarding link count, category count, article count, etc.

setting.name: TITLE
setting.info: This title shows at top of the widget's generated content.

setting.name: ACTIVE LINKS
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the number of active links to show up in stats, otherwise "No".

setting.name: PENDING LINKS
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the number of pending links to show up in stats, otherwise "No".

setting.name: TODAY LINKS
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the number of today's links to show up in stats, otherwise set "No".

setting.name: TOTAL CATEGORIES
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the total number of categories to show up in stats, otherwise "No".

setting.name: SUBCATEGORIES
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the number of subcategories to show up in stats, otherwise "No".

setting.name: CACHE RESULTS
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the results to be cached, "No" if not.

widget.author: PhpLD
